attributes.action: allow the posession of non-lethal weapons designed purely for self-defence, such as pepper-spray, extensible batons, tasers etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The criminal has no compunction about arming himself in order to inflict harm upon law-abiding citizens. The various means of self-defence have been removed by successive governments; the result being that the general populace are  defenceless against attacks by thugs intent on robbery, rape or murder. 
We demand the right to defend ourselves  using non-lethal, specifically-designed,  defensive equipment.
